mapper.select: SELECT partNumber, partName, partNo, partPrice, modelNo FROM (SELECT partNumber, partName, partNo, partPrice, modelNo FROM PART ORDER BY partNumber DESC) AS T1 LIMIT #{skip}, #{perPageNum}
SELECT modelNo FROM MODEL WHERE modelName like concat ('%', #{keyword}, '%')

SELECT p.partNumber, p.partName, p.partNo, p.partPrice, p.modelNo, m.modelName FROM PART p LEFT OUTER JOIN MODEL m ON p.modelNo = m.modelNo
ORDER BY m.modelNo DESC LIMIT #{skip}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PART (partName, partNo, partPrice) VALUES (#{partName}, #{partNo}, #{partPrice})
mapper.select: SELECT p.partNumber, p.partName, p.partPrice, p.modelNo, m.modelName FROM PART p LEFT JOIN MODEL m on p.modelNo = m.modelNo WHERE p.partName = #{partName} ORDER BY p.partName, p.partPrice
SELECT partName, partNo FROM PART WHERE partName LIKE concat('%',#{partName}, '%') GROUP BY partName ORDER BY partName
